name: backend
description: This is my #DevCTrainingWithAndela Capstone Project 'Team-work' Backend. Teamwork is an internal social network for employees of an organization. The goal of this application is to facilitate more interaction between colleagues and promote team bonding.

scripts.test: set process.env.NODE_ENV=test && node src/usingDB/db/db.js createUserTable && node src/usingDB/db/db.js createFeedTable && node src/usingDB/db/db.js createImageTable && node src/usingDB/db/db.js createArticleCommentTable && node src/usingDB/db/db.js createImageCommentTable && node src/usingDB/db/db.js deleteRow && mocha --recursive --timeout 0 --exit || true
scripts.db-refresh:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test && node src/usingDB/db/db.js dropArticleTable && node src/usingDB/db/db.js dropUserTable && node src/usingDB/db/db.js createUserTable && node src/usingDB/db/db.js createArticleTable
scripts.db-refresh:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && node src/usingDB/db/db.js dropArticleTable && node src/usingDB/db/db.js dropUserTable && node src/usingDB/db/db.js createUserTable && node src/usingDB/db/db.js createArticleTable
